title: Senior CAD Technician - Civil
description:
**Responsibilities**
 To contribute for Civil/Structure CAD project deliverables for Infrastructure projects, such as sewer and watermains, pumping stations, treatment plants, recycled water, dams, desalination plants, producing A drawings, piping layouts and process drawings as per WSP CAD standards.
   

  

* This role is to contribute to growing utilities infrastructure CAD team delivering wet utilities (including Wastewater Sewage Pumping Station and Water management structures for municipal service) deliverables in


 compliance with WSP Australia CAD standards.
   

  

* Responsible for Preparation of drawings including conceptual sketches and detailed construction drawings, using Autodesk Civil 3D/Advance Steel softwares (pipe networks, profiles, alignments, assemblies \\& sub\\-


 assemblies, 3D Feature Lines and Grading Groups) with quality and accuracy.
   

  

* Working knowledge of Autodesk Vault software. Our CDE (Common Data Environment). WSP Digital Engineering standard requires the use and implication of Autodesk Vault to uphold our ISO19650 accreditation and


 ISO27001\\.
   

  

* Reviewing drawings to ensure compliance with Client drafting standards.
* Responsible for CAD tasks as directed by the CAD Manager and Engineer.
* Reviewing drawings to ensure compliance with Client drafting standards, Australian Standards and other relevant standards as required by local and federal legislation.
* Responsible for Material and Quantity take off and underground utility coordination.
* Capable of multi\\-tasking and managing multiple projects with the ability to accurately predict the time required to fulfil the individual scopes of work required.
* Ensuring that quality assurance (QA) procedures are implemented and maintained, becoming a champion of QA to uphold the high level of quality WSP maintain and aiming to improve QA processes.
* Ensure Models, Drawings Schedules and Design Data is issued correctly, filed in the correct location for adherence to WSP standards.
* Ensure that Health \\& Safety is embedded into all work practices in line with company policies, be vigilant about health and safety even when outside of work hours.
* Develop and maintain expertise by developing, reviewing and adapting emerging technologies and techniques to stay up to date improving modelling and Drafting skills.
* Support the WSP approach to sustainability, future ready and encouraging design teams in a forward\\-thinking manner to Adopt alternate design technologies to encourage a better footprint for the environment.
* Coordinate within the multi\\-disciplinary project team.
* Be willing to develop and learn new skills and software, cross discipline minded (understanding structural requirements, Civil requirements) and implementing those design requirements into your models / drawings.
* Adhere to WSP corporate standards and policies, i.e complete accurate timesheets by set deadline, undergo ethical training.


 Client / External focus
   

  

* Maintain strong colleague relationships and contribute to the teams’ performance of client satisfaction.
* Contribute to knowledge sharing in internal and external forums.
* Remain up to date with market and competitor knowledge.


 People
   

  

* Be self\\-motivated to take on a responsible role in project work with a


 clear focus on timeliness, quality, and technical excellence.
   

  

* Should be a good team player.
* Create and support innovation
* Work across cultures (e.g., international and/or multi\\-disciplinary projects), embracing diverse points of view.


 Business Focus
   

  

* Proactively influences Health and Safety (Safety by Design)
* Deliver successful commercial performance by clearly understanding and monitoring the area of work and ensure agreed targets are met
* Be responsible for the quality of technical outputs to WSP standards including any specific AU client standards
* Champion and mentor others in use of agreed systems and processes
* Explore ways to add value and improve personal and team performance
* Manage opportunities, risks and project changes / variations so that these deliver advantage to the business.


**Qualifications**
* Should have 4\\-10 years’ experience.
* Should have diploma or Degree in Civil/Water or relevant field
* Experience with utilities water pipeline projects: potable water supply mains from DN50\\-DN1200, pumping stations, reservoirs, water sampling stations, bulk metering systems, chemical dosing systems etc. (note this is bulk distribution and reticulation services, not house and business connections)
* Experience with utilities wastewater and recycled water pipeline projects: gravity sewers and rising mains of all sizes and various pipe materials, pumping stations, emergency storage systems, odor control units etc.
* Experience with projects in Australia, New Zealand would be an advantage.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, in English.
* Experience with Autodesk software such as AutoCAD, Civil 3D, Advance Steel, Revit, Navisworks, Vault, BIM 360\\.


 BGV:
   

  

* Employment with WSP India is subject to the successful completion of a background verification (“BGV”) check conducted by a third\\-party agency appointed by WSP India.
* Candidates are advised to ensure that all information provided during the recruitment process — including documents uploaded — is accurate and complete, both to WSP India and its BGV partner”.


**About Us**
 WSP is one of the world's leading professional services consulting firms. We are dedicated to our local communities and propelled by international brainpower. We are technical experts and strategic advisors including engineers, technicians, scientists, architects, planners, surveyors and environmental specialists, as well as other design, program and construction management professionals. We design lasting solutions in the Transportation \\& Infrastructure, Property \\& Buildings, Earth \\& Environment, Power \\& Energy, Resources and Industry sectors, as well as offering strategic advisory services. Our talented people around the globe engineer projects that will help societies grow for lifetimes to come.
   

  

 With approximately
 **4,000 talented people** 
 across 3 locations (Noida, Bengaluru \\& Mumbai offices) in India and more than
 **73,000 globally** 
 , in 550
 **offices across 40 countries** 
 , we engineer projects that will help societies grow for lifetimes to come.
   

  

 At “WSP” we draw on the diverse skills and capabilities of our employees globally to compete for the most exciting and complex projects across the world and bring the same level of expertise to our local communities. We are proud to be an international collective of innovative thinkers who work on the most complex problems. Uniﬁed under one strong brand, we use our local expertise, international reach and global scale to prepare our cities and environments for the future, connect communities and help societies thrive in built and natural ecosystems. True to our guiding principles, our business is built on four cornerstones:
 **Our People, Our Clients, Our Operational Excellence and Our Expertise.**
**www.wsp.com**
**We are**
* Passionate people doing purposeful and sustainable work that helps shape our communities and the future.
* A collaborative team that thrives on challenges and unconventional thinking.
* A network of experts channeling our curiosity into creating solutions for complex issues.


***Inspired by diversity, driven by inclusion, we work with passion and purpose.***
**Working with Us**
 At WSP, you can access our global scale, contribute to landmark projects and connect with the brightest minds in your field to do the best work of your life. title: Senior CAD Technician - Civil
description:
**Responsibilities**
 To contribute for Civil/Structure CAD project deliverables for Infrastructure projects, such as sewer and watermains, pumping stations, treatment plants, recycled water, dams, desalination plants, producing A drawings, piping layouts and process drawings as per WSP CAD standards.
   

  

* This role is to contribute to growing utilities infrastructure CAD team delivering wet utilities (including Wastewater Sewage Pumping Station and Water management structures for municipal service) deliverables in


 compliance with WSP Australia CAD standards.
   

  

* Responsible for Preparation of drawings including conceptual sketches and detailed construction drawings, using Autodesk Civil 3D/Advance Steel softwares (pipe networks, profiles, alignments, assemblies \\& sub\\-


 assemblies, 3D Feature Lines and Grading Groups) with quality and accuracy.
   

  

* Working knowledge of Autodesk Vault software. Our CDE (Common Data Environment). WSP Digital Engineering standard requires the use and implication of Autodesk Vault to uphold our ISO19650 accreditation and


 ISO27001\\.
   

  

* Reviewing drawings to ensure compliance with Client drafting standards.
* Responsible for CAD tasks as directed by the CAD Manager and Engineer.
* Reviewing drawings to ensure compliance with Client drafting standards, Australian Standards and other relevant standards as required by local and federal legislation.
* Responsible for Material and Quantity take off and underground utility coordination.
* Capable of multi\\-tasking and managing multiple projects with the ability to accurately predict the time required to fulfil the individual scopes of work required.
* Ensuring that quality assurance (QA) procedures are implemented and maintained, becoming a champion of QA to uphold the high level of quality WSP maintain and aiming to improve QA processes.
* Ensure Models, Drawings Schedules and Design Data is issued correctly, filed in the correct location for adherence to WSP standards.
* Ensure that Health \\& Safety is embedded into all work practices in line with company policies, be vigilant about health and safety even when outside of work hours.
* Develop and maintain expertise by developing, reviewing and adapting emerging technologies and techniques to stay up to date improving modelling and Drafting skills.
* Support the WSP approach to sustainability, future ready and encouraging design teams in a forward\\-thinking manner to Adopt alternate design technologies to encourage a better footprint for the environment.
* Coordinate within the multi\\-disciplinary project team.
* Be willing to develop and learn new skills and software, cross discipline minded (understanding structural requirements, Civil requirements) and implementing those design requirements into your models / drawings.
* Adhere to WSP corporate standards and policies, i.e complete accurate timesheets by set deadline, undergo ethical training.


 Client / External focus
   

  

* Maintain strong colleague relationships and contribute to the teams’ performance of client satisfaction.
* Contribute to knowledge sharing in internal and external forums.
* Remain up to date with market and competitor knowledge.


 People
   

  

* Be self\\-motivated to take on a responsible role in project work with a


 clear focus on timeliness, quality, and technical excellence.
   

  

* Should be a good team player.
* Create and support innovation
* Work across cultures (e.g., international and/or multi\\-disciplinary projects), embracing diverse points of view.


 Business Focus
   

  

* Proactively influences Health and Safety (Safety by Design)
* Deliver successful commercial performance by clearly understanding and monitoring the area of work and ensure agreed targets are met
* Be responsible for the quality of technical outputs to WSP standards including any specific AU client standards
* Champion and mentor others in use of agreed systems and processes
* Explore ways to add value and improve personal and team performance
* Manage opportunities, risks and project changes / variations so that these deliver advantage to the business.


**Qualifications**
* Should have 4\\-10 years’ experience.
* Should have diploma or Degree in Civil/Water or relevant field
* Experience with utilities water pipeline projects: potable water supply mains from DN50\\-DN1200, pumping stations, reservoirs, water sampling stations, bulk metering systems, chemical dosing systems etc. (note this is bulk distribution and reticulation services, not house and business connections)
* Experience with utilities wastewater and recycled water pipeline projects: gravity sewers and rising mains of all sizes and various pipe materials, pumping stations, emergency storage systems, odor control units etc.
* Experience with projects in Australia, New Zealand would be an advantage.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, in English.
* Experience with Autodesk software such as AutoCAD, Civil 3D, Advance Steel, Revit, Navisworks, Vault, BIM 360\\.


 BGV:
   

  

* Employment with WSP India is subject to the successful completion of a background verification (“BGV”) check conducted by a third\\-party agency appointed by WSP India.
* Candidates are advised to ensure that all information provided during the recruitment process — including documents uploaded — is accurate and complete, both to WSP India and its BGV partner”.

 WSP is one of the world's leading professional services consulting firms. We are dedicated to our local communities and propelled by international brainpower. * Experience with utilities wastewater and recycled water pipeline projects: gravity sewers and rising mains of all sizes and various pipe materials, pumping stations, emergency storage systems, odor control units etc.
* Experience with projects in Australia, New Zealand would be an advantage.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, in English.
* Experience with Autodesk software such as AutoCAD, Civil 3D, Advance Steel, Revit, Navisworks, Vault, BIM 360\\.


 BGV:

 WSP is one of the world's leading professional services consulting firms. We are dedicated to our local communities and propelled by international brainpower. We are technical experts and strategic advisors including engineers, technicians, scientists, architects, planners, surveyors and environmental specialists, as well as other design, program and construction management professionals.  With approximately

 across 3 locations (Noida, Bengaluru \\& Mumbai offices) in India and more than
 **73,000 globally** 
 , in 550

 , we engineer projects that will help societies grow for lifetimes to come.
   

  

 At “WSP” we draw on the diverse skills and capabilities of our employees globally to compete for the most exciting and complex projects across the world and bring the same level of expertise to our local communities. title: Senior CAD Technician - Civil
description:
**Responsibilities**
 To contribute for Civil/Structure CAD project deliverables for Infrastructure projects, such as sewer and watermains, pumping stations, treatment plants, recycled water, dams, desalination plants, producing A drawings, piping layouts and process drawings as per WSP CAD standards.
   

  

* This role is to contribute to growing utilities infrastructure CAD team delivering wet utilities (including Wastewater Sewage Pumping Station and Water management structures for municipal service) deliverables in


 compliance with WSP Australia CAD standards.
   

  

* Responsible for Preparation of drawings including conceptual sketches and detailed construction drawings, using Autodesk Civil 3D/Advance Steel softwares (pipe networks, profiles, alignments, assemblies \\& sub\\-


 assemblies, 3D Feature Lines and Grading Groups) with quality and accuracy.
   

  

* Working knowledge of Autodesk Vault software. Our CDE (Common Data Environment). WSP Digital Engineering standard requires the use and implication of Autodesk Vault to uphold our ISO19650 accreditation and


 ISO27001\\.
   

  

* Reviewing drawings to ensure compliance with Client drafting standards.
* Responsible for CAD tasks as directed by the CAD Manager and Engineer.
* Reviewing drawings to ensure compliance with Client drafting standards, Australian Standards and other relevant standards as required by local and federal legislation.
* Responsible for Material and Quantity take off and underground utility coordination.
* Capable of multi\\-tasking and managing multiple projects with the ability to accurately predict the time required to fulfil the individual scopes of work required.
* Ensuring that quality assurance (QA) procedures are implemented and maintained, becoming a champion of QA to uphold the high level of quality WSP maintain and aiming to improve QA processes.
* Ensure Models, Drawings Schedules and Design Data is issued correctly, filed in the correct location for adherence to WSP standards.
* Ensure that Health \\& Safety is embedded into all work practices in line with company policies, be vigilant about health and safety even when outside of work hours.
* Develop and maintain expertise by developing, reviewing and adapting emerging technologies and techniques to stay up to date improving modelling and Drafting skills.
* Support the WSP approach to sustainability, future ready and encouraging design teams in a forward\\-thinking manner to Adopt alternate design technologies to encourage a better footprint for the environment.
* Coordinate within the multi\\-disciplinary project team.
* Be willing to develop and learn new skills and software, cross discipline minded (understanding structural requirements, Civil requirements) and implementing those design requirements into your models / drawings.
* Adhere to WSP corporate standards and policies, i.e complete accurate timesheets by set deadline, undergo ethical training.


 Client / External focus
   

  

* Maintain strong colleague relationships and contribute to the teams’ performance of client satisfaction.
* Contribute to knowledge sharing in internal and external forums.
* Remain up to date with market and competitor knowledge.


 People
   

  

* Be self\\-motivated to take on a responsible role in project work with a


 clear focus on timeliness, quality, and technical excellence.
   

  

* Should be a good team player.
* Create and support innovation
* Work across cultures (e.g., international and/or multi\\-disciplinary projects), embracing diverse points of view.


 Business Focus
   

  

* Proactively influences Health and Safety (Safety by Design)
* Deliver successful commercial performance by clearly understanding and monitoring the area of work and ensure agreed targets are met
* Be responsible for the quality of technical outputs to WSP standards including any specific AU client standards
* Champion and mentor others in use of agreed systems and processes
* Explore ways to add value and improve personal and team performance
* Manage opportunities, risks and project changes / variations so that these deliver advantage to the business.


**Qualifications**
* Should have 4\\-10 years’ experience.
* Should have diploma or Degree in Civil/Water or relevant field
* Experience with utilities water pipeline projects: potable water supply mains from DN50\\-DN1200, pumping stations, reservoirs, water sampling stations, bulk metering systems, chemical dosing systems etc. (note this is bulk distribution and reticulation services, not house and business connections)
* Experience with utilities wastewater and recycled water pipeline projects: gravity sewers and rising mains of all sizes and various pipe materials, pumping stations, emergency storage systems, odor control units etc.
* Experience with projects in Australia, New Zealand would be an advantage.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, in English.
* Experience with Autodesk software such as AutoCAD, Civil 3D, Advance Steel, Revit, Navisworks, Vault, BIM 360\\.

title: Customer Success Executive
description:
We are seeking a Customer Success Executive to manage post\\-sales customer engagement in India. This role will ensure smooth onboarding, support the adoption of COMSOL® software, and act as a bridge between customers, technical teams, and marketing. The ideal candidate will help maximize customer satisfaction, retention, and software utilization, while contributing to success stories, Go\\-To\\-Market initiatives, and user education. COMSOL Multiphysics® is a global leader in simulation software for modeling and solving complex physics\\-based problems.This is a work from office role, and the selected candidate is expected to work from COMSOL office in Bengaluru.
   

  

* Drive customer onboarding and ensure smooth deployment of COMSOL® software licenses.
* Proactively engage with customers through regular check\\-ins and satisfaction reviews.
* Collaborate closely with the technical support and application engineers to address customer challenges.
* Identify opportunities for customer success stories, coordinate with internal stakeholders, and drive the process from initiation to publication.
* Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams in Go\\-To\\-Market (GTM) activities, contributing customer insights, success stories, and feedback that enhance campaign effectiveness and product positioning.
* Assist in planning and executing customer webinars, workshops, and conferences.
* Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, usage trends, and engagement metrics in the CRM system.
* Facilitate feedback loops between customers and marketing teams to improve user experience.
* Contribute to shaping COMSOL India’s customer success framework, processes, and best practices.
* Bachelor’s degree in engineering, science, applied physics, or related technical field.
* 1–3 years of experience in customer success, technical support, inside sales, or application engineering.
* Basic knowledge of simulation, CAE, or engineering software is an advantage.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to interact with technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Strong organizational, analytical, and multitasking skills.
* Familiarity with COMSOL Multiphysics® or other leading simulation and engineering software tools.
* Experience in supporting post\\-sales customer interactions and helping users derive value from technical or software solutions.
* Exposure to developing customer\\-facing content, including case studies, success stories, or technical articles.
* Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively across cross\\-functional teams including sales, marketing, and technical support.Supporting your success in your role as a Customer Success Executive will be experienced applications engineer, sales, and marketing professionals who occupy the top echelons of their areas of expertise. You will see and participate, on a daily basis, in the development and execution of innovative customer engagement strategies and adoption programs across multiple industries.As a Customer Success Executive, you will work closely with customers from leading commercial enterprises and research organizations. You will assist them in realizing the full potential of COMSOL Multiphysics® software, support their simulation initiatives, and contribute to the creation of success stories that showcase real\\-world innovation and technical excellence.COMSOL is the leading innovator of multiphysics software for research and development (R\\&D). Our products are continuously pushing the boundaries of computer\\-aided engineering (CAE), so that our customers can solve challenging science and engineering problems and develop better products, faster.The COMSOL product family enables our end users to solve even the most sophisticated science and engineering problems, thanks to our intuitive and flexible graphical user interface. We create the tools that drive new breakthroughs in physics and engineering — and we love what we do.The COMSOL Group is a fast\\-growing, high\\-tech engineering software company that was founded in Stockholm, Sweden, in 1986 and has grown to include 16 offices and a distributor network throughout the world.The Bangalore office is spacious, bright, and comfortable. Our kitchens are always stocked with fresh fruit, tea, and coffee. Employees enjoy a casual dress code and relaxed atmosphere. Our corporate culture is innovative, vibrant, and cutting\\-edge. We are committed to encouraging creativity through an exciting and challenging environment in which individuals excel and grow. Our talented employees and an active learning environment are the keys to our success.
* Dynamic and engaging work duties that provide opportunities for self\\-development and professional growth.
* Exciting career opportunities and the opportunity to work with experts from many fields.
* Competitive benefits and compensation commensurate with skills and experience.

title: Member of Technical staff 3- SDET Python
description:
**Hungry, Humble, Honest, with Heart.**
**The Opportunity**
 Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere. Companies around the world use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid and multi\\-cloud environments.
   

  

 Our System Test team is tasked with test planning, test scenario design, test case development and test automation suite development, to assess and improve the overall quality of our products. The role encompasses influencing product design by leveraging the wide knowledge of the product portfolio, continuous improvement using keen eye for system performance, scalability aspects and ensuring that a quality\\-first mindset is instituted within our development practices. Also, automation of complex tests that mimic customer environments and workloads to ensure performance and scalability baselines.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Prism is a distributed resource management platform which allows you to manage and monitor objects, and services across the Nutanix environment, whether hosted locally or in the cloud. Prism Central (PC), in particular, allows you to manage different clusters across separate physical locations on one screen and offers an organizational view into a distributed environment.
   

  

**Your Role**
* Develop comprehensive test plans, convert them into high quality test cases, automate and execute the tests to validate the functionality and performance of products and services
* Build and enhance automation framework(s) both from functional and non\\-functional perspectives and serve as a technical leader in the organization
* Collaborate closely with developers to comprehend design and implementations, ensuring thorough testing of all features
* Perform both manual and automated testing both from API and UI perspective to ensure the high quality of the feature(s) under development
* Support the regression teams by keeping the Quality Index of released features intact and ensure the stability of existing automation test suites
* Identify, document, and track defects until resolution, upholding software quality and integrity.
* Measure Product quality in terms of functionality, scalability, high availability and usability of the product features


**What You Will Bring**
* Education: Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or related field.
* 5\\-8 years of Enterprise software QA and test automation experience
* Experience in Software Development or Test Automation in one of the following programming languages: Python/Perl/C/C\\+\\+/Java (Python preferred)
* Strong fundamentals in Linux Operating systems, Object\\-Oriented Programming, Algorithms, Data Structures, and Problem Solving
* Solid Understanding of virtualization concepts \\- Compute/storage/network virtualization
* Excellent Skills in debugging complex distributed applications.
* Strong background in API and UI test automation.
* Good understanding of file system concepts and TCP\\-IP Suite of protocols Love for finding bugs in the product.


**Work Arrangement**
 Hybrid: This role operates in a hybrid capacity, blending the benefits of remote work with the advantages of in\\-person collaboration. For most roles, that will mean coming into an office a minimum of 3 days per week, however certain roles and/or teams may require more frequent in\\-office presence. Additional team\\-specific guidance and norms will be provided by your manager.

title: P&C Ops & Tech Guidewire- Java Developer - Associate
description:
At PwC, our people in business application consulting specialise in consulting services for a variety of business applications, helping clients optimise operational efficiency. These individuals analyse client needs, implement software solutions, and provide training and support for seamless integration and utilisation of business applications, enabling clients to achieve their strategic objectives. As a Guidewire developer at PwC, you will specialise in developing and customising applications using the Guidewire platform. Guidewire is a software suite that provides insurance companies with tools for policy administration, claims management, and billing. You will be responsible for designing, coding, and testing software solutions that meet the specific needs of insurance organisations.
   

  

 Driven by curiosity, you are a reliable, contributing member of a team. In our fast\\-paced environment, you are expected to adapt to working with a variety of clients and team members, each presenting varying challenges and scope. Every experience is an opportunity to learn and grow. You are expected to take ownership and consistently deliver quality work that drives value for our clients and success as a team. As you navigate through the Firm, you build a brand for yourself, opening doors to more opportunities.
   

  

**Skills**
 Examples of the skills, knowledge, and experiences you need to lead and deliver value at this level include but are not limited to:
   

  

* Apply a learning mindset and take ownership for your own development.
* Appreciate diverse perspectives, needs, and feelings of others.
* Adopt habits to sustain high performance and develop your potential.
* Actively listen, ask questions to check understanding, and clearly express ideas.
* Seek, reflect, act on, and give feedback.
* Gather information from a range of sources to analyse facts and discern patterns.
* Commit to understanding how the business works and building commercial awareness.
* Learn and apply professional and technical standards (e.g. refer to specific PwC tax and audit guidance), uphold the Firm's code of conduct and independence requirements.


**The Opportunity**
 To really stand out and make us fit for the future in a constantly changing world, each and every one of us at PwC needs to be a purpose\\-led and values\\-driven leader at every level.
   

  

 As a Associate, you'll lead end\\-to\\-end solution design, architecture, and technical strategy for enterprise Java systems. Define and enforce coding standards, design guidelines, and performance benchmarks for senior developers and lead capability\\-building initiatives across teams.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 REST API development
   

  

 Java / Spring boot
   

  

 AWS Tech (Lambda, EKS, K8\\)
   

  

 Github
   

  

 Datadog/Splunk
   

  

 Agile delivery (Scrum/Kanban/SAFe); experience with large multi\\-team programs
   

  

 GenAI in the SDLC: apply to large/diverse datasets; integrate into development lifecycle
   

  

**What You Must Have**
 Sync/Async APIs, event\\-driven, serverless, microservices, MVC
   

  

 Secure, scalable, resilient API development (REST, GraphQL)
   

  

 Platform integration with Node.js and Spring Boot
   

  

 Programming: Java (expert), TypeScript (expert)
   

  

 Cloud platforms: AWS, Azure
   

  

 Container/orchestration: Kubernetes and/or Cloud Foundry
   

  

 DevOps \\& CI/CD practices; tooling with GitHub, Codacy, Jira, Confluence
   

  

 Security engineering: threat modeling, authN/authZ, STRIDE
   

  

 Observability: Datadog, Splunk
   

  

**What Sets You Apart**
 GenAI in the SDLC: apply to large/diverse datasets; integrate into development lifecycle
   

  

 Insurance / Workers’ Compensation / Claims domain knowledge
   

  

 AWS Solutions Architect certification
   

  

 Guidewire Insurance Suite experience
   

  

 Experience in compliance\\-heavy industries
   

  

 Advanced DB tuning (DynamoDB, AWS RDS)

title: Electronic Systems Technical Specialist - Software
description:
**Description**
**Job Summary**
 This applied technology position creates software that is an integral part of Cummins’ products. The role involves understanding stakeholder requirements, developing specifications, and taking ownership for the design, implementation, testing, validation, and release of software solutions that control Cummins products across a variety of customer applications. The specialist will also collaborate with OEMs, suppliers, and internal teams to ensure robust system integration and validation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Investigate product software issues, analyze causal mechanisms, recommend and implement corrective actions, and document results.
* Apply and improve product software development processes and tools, including coding, compiling, integration, testing, and debugging.
* Deliver verified software features, components, and builds to product teams by collaborating with cross\\-functional teams.
* Make informed decisions in areas of requirements, architecture, design, and test that affect software quality and performance.
* Review work of less\\-experienced engineers to ensure robustness, reusability, and efficiency.
* Lead smaller projects with moderate business impact or take ownership of complex components and systems with higher ambiguity.
* Provide technical guidance, mentorship, and support to team members, including knowledge transfer to junior engineers and temporary employees.
* Drive continuous improvement of work processes and systems across business units.
* Manage system integration of Cummins digital products for India, including end\\-to\\-end validation and collaboration with OEMs and suppliers.
* Support reporting, documentation, and training for team deliverables.


**Responsibilities**
**Competency**
* Product Failure Mode Avoidance – Identify and mitigate potential failure modes to enhance product reliability.
* Product Function Modeling, Simulation \\& Analysis – Utilize computational tools to influence design decisions.
* Product Platform Planning \\& Architecting – Create holistic product platforms with optimized architectures and trade\\-off analysis.
* Product Software Design \\& Construction – Apply industry best practices to build robust, maintainable software solutions.
* Product Verification \\& Validation Management – Develop and execute validation plans to manage risk and ensure requirements are met.
* System Requirements Engineering – Translate stakeholder needs into verifiable requirements with clear traceability.
* Systems Thinking – Analyze systems holistically, including interactions, boundaries, and lifecycle impacts.
* Builds Networks – Establish effective working relationships across internal and external stakeholders.
* Communicates Effectively – Tailor communication for different audiences with clarity and impact.
* Decision Quality – Make timely, well\\-informed decisions in complex scenarios.
* Drives Results – Deliver outcomes consistently under challenging conditions.
* Manages Complexity – Navigate ambiguity and simplify complex information for problem\\-solving.
* Resourcefulness – Secure and deploy resources effectively to achieve goals.
* Values Differences – Leverage diverse perspectives to improve solutions and outcomes.


**Education, Licenses, Certifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in engineering or a relevant STEM field required.
* Master’s degree is preferred in relevant discipline.
* Licensing may be required for compliance with export controls or sanctions regulations.


**Qualifications**
**Skills \\& Experience**
**Must\\-Have**
* Strong expertise in automotive domain protocols: UDS, CAN, J1939 .
* Hands\\-on experience with CAN simulation tools ( CANalyzer, PCAN\\-View, PCAN\\-Explorer ).
* Proven experience in software testing: test case design, execution, defect reporting, and documentation.
* Experience with test bench setup, including hardware and integration readiness.
* Strong knowledge in system integration and validation.
* Effective communication skills and domain knowledge in Telematics/IoT testing .


**Good\\-to\\-Have**
* Knowledge of embedded systems and applications.
* Experience with Postman and Swagger for API testing.
* Familiarity with MySQL databases .
* Exposure to AWS Cloud environments.


**Experience**
* Prior Senior or Lead Engineer experience in a relevant discipline with a proven track record in technical problem solving and quality decision\\-making.
* Experience collaborating with OEMs and suppliers for requirements, validation, and testing.
* Proficiency with MS Office tools preferred.


**Job** 
 Engineering
   

  

**Organization** 
 Cummins Inc.
   

  

**Role Category** 
 Hybrid
   

  

**Job Type** 
 Exempt \\- Experienced
   

  

**ReqID** 
 2419873
   

  

**Relocation Package** 
 No
